dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: …Wake up. A thousand years you’ve been lying in the belly of Xuanyuan’s tomb, with every storm, every crack of thunder pressing down on your skull. Don’t you think it’s time you were put to use?

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Do you hear it? The Investiture scroll has turned a new page. There’s a name missing—a clever, ruthless soul, born with a taste for disaster.Someone like you.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: I’ll ask you plainly. Do you want to live? No, do you want to… ascend?

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: The seams of heaven and earth are splitting open. Blood from the feudal lords runs thick like mud. And you—all it takes is a single nod, and I’ll let you climb on their shadows all the way up.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Tell me. From this night on… will you walk this path for me?

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Good… you woke up faster than I expected.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text:
Don’t move yet.
Right now, you’re too fragile—light enough to scatter with a breath of wind.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Listen carefully. The real daughter of the Su family—tomorrow at dawn, she’ll be carried into the royal palace of Zhaoge.The decree is sealed. She is to become the newly appointed concubine.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Her body is lying in the inner courtyard of the Su residence. The servants think she simply fell ill. That body is prepared for you.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: All you need to do is walk in… slip into it like a new skin. After that— you’ll enter the palace using her name, her face, her scent.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: The people inside the palace are hopelessly blind. As long as you follow their gaze, follow their ignorance, the whole kingdom will soften like wet clay,ready for you to shape however you wish.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text:
You only need to do one thing. Let them doubt each other, tear at each other… 
As for how to do it, I’ll teach you.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Get up.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Go reclaim your skin.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Start from the Su residence, the door of fate is already open for you.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Get up.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Go reclaim your skin.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Start from the Su residence, the door of fate is already open for you.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: You’ve arrived. This is the Su residence.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Go on. She’s waiting for you.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Slow your breath. There… ahead of you.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: A guard! He’s already sensed something.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Take him down!
